properties.name: CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: The minimum confidence score which must be met or exceeded. Detections below this threshold are silently discarded. Confidence value represents the average OCR confidence reported by Tesseract for a given TESSERACT_LANGUAGE setting. When PSM 0 (OSD only) is run, this value is set to default value of -1, as no OCR confidence score is available.

properties.name: MODELS_DIR_PATH
properties.description: Path to models directory

properties.name: TAGGING_FILE
properties.description: Name of a JSON file that describes a tag hierarchy to be used on the full text returned from Tesseract OCR. Will default to the plugin's config folder unless an alternate path to tagging file is specified (i.e. `$MPF_HOME/.../text-tags.json`).

properties.name: TESSERACT_LANGUAGE
properties.description: The language or script OCR will be done in. Use '+' to run multiple languages together in one track and ',' to run them as separate tracks. Example: 'eng+deu+fra' = run English, German, French together as one track detection, 'eng, fra+deu'= run English as the first track and French + German as the second track, and 'fra, script/Latin'= run French as the first track, and Latin script as the second track. Language model files for Bulgarian (bul), Chinese - Simplified (chi_sim), German (deu), English (eng), French (fra), Pashto (pus), Russian (rus), and Spanish (spa) are stored in `$MPF_HOME/plugins/TesseractOCRTextDetection/tessdata`. Script model file for Latin(script/Latin) stored in `$MPF_HOME/plugins/TesseractOCRTextDetection/tessdata/script`. Note the osd language file (osd.traindata) is for extraction of script orientation rather than language. Users may download and load in additional language and script models from https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata.

properties.name: TESSERACT_PSM
properties.description: Tesseract Page Segmentation Mode. Refer to Tesseract docs (https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/wiki/Command-Line-Usage) for details.

properties.name: TESSERACT_OEM
properties.description: Tesseract OCR Engine Mode. Set to 0 for legacy engine only, 1 for LSTM engine only, 2 for both LSTM and legacy, and 3 for default (runs both engines at once if possible). Refer to Tesseract docs (https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/wiki/Command-Line-Usage) for details.

properties.name: ENABLE_OSD_AUTOMATION
properties.description: When enabled, automatically rotate image and set language based on detected orientation and script. Use default settings when orientation and script confidence values are low.

properties.name: ENABLE_OSD_FALLBACK
properties.description: When enabled, runs a second pass through OSD when the initial pass fails to produce a result or the best OSD score falls below the minimum specified threshold. OSD is then run on multiple copies of input text image to get an improved prediction score. The results are then kept depending on the minimum OSD threshold.

properties.name: MAX_PARALLEL_SCRIPT_THREADS
properties.description: When set to a value <= 1, OCR parallel processing is disabled. When set to a value > 1, OCR may be performed in parallel using up to the specified number of threads, where each thread is using a different script. Disabled during parallel processing of PDF pages.

properties.name: MAX_PARALLEL_PAGE_THREADS
properties.description: When set to a value <= 1, PDF parallel page processing is disabled. When set to a value > 1, processing of pages may be performed in parallel using up to the specified number of threads, where each thread is processing OCR runs for a different page.

properties.name: COMBINE_OSD_SCRIPTS
properties.description: When enabled, perform OCR on the combination of detected scripts. When disabled, perform OCR on each detected script independently.

properties.name: MIN_OSD_TEXT_ORIENTATION_CONFIDENCE
properties.description: Specifies the minimum confidence value (>= 0) required to use the detected text orientation when OSD automation is enabled. Top rotation confidence is calculated based on comparison of top-detected rotation score against secondary (lower confidence) rotation scores.

properties.name: MIN_OSD_PRIMARY_SCRIPT_CONFIDENCE
properties.description: Specifies minimum confidence value (>= 0) required to use the top-detected script when OSD automation is enabled. Script confidence is calculated based on comparison of top-detected script score against the second-best script score.

properties.name: MIN_OSD_SCRIPT_SCORE
properties.description: Specifies minimum required score (>= 0) to use the detected script when OSD automation is enabled. Unlike script confidence which only applies for the top-detected script, each secondary script processed during OSD also has its own script score. Thus, this threshold can be used to support multiple script detections.

properties.name: MIN_OSD_SECONDARY_SCRIPT_THRESHOLD
properties.description: When running OSD automation, sets the min relative score threshold for running any secondary scripts. I.e. If set to 0.80, only scripts with raw scores that are at least 80% of the primary script score are allowed.

properties.name: MAX_OSD_SCRIPTS
properties.description: Specifies maximum number of detected scripts by OSD. When set to 0 or below, allow any number of scripts with acceptable threshold scores.

properties.name: MAX_TEXT_TRACKS
properties.description: Specifies number of reported text tracks per page based on average confidence scores. When set to 0 or below, allow any number of tracks.

properties.name: MIN_HEIGHT
properties.description: If set to a positive value, rescales all images to specified pixel height if smaller than provided limit. Preserves image aspect ratio.

properties.name: INVERT
properties.description: Toggles image color inversion during preprocessing for default, structured text images.

properties.name: ADAPTIVE_THRS_BLOCKSIZE
properties.description: Specifies pixel radius for calculating adaptive threshold value for all images preprocessed under adaptive thresholding.

properties.name: ADAPTIVE_THRS_CONSTANT
properties.description: Specifies constant subtracted from adaptive threshold mean.

properties.name: ADAPTIVE_HIST_TILE_SIZE
properties.description: In adaptive histogram equalization, images are subdivided into tiles before histogram equalization is applied. This specifies the height and width of each image tile used for adaptive histogram equalization.

properties.name: ADAPTIVE_HIST_CLIP_LIMIT
properties.description: Specifies clip limit parameter for adaptive histogram equalization. Higher values limits contrast amplification of images during histogram equalization, in order to reduce image noise.

properties.name: STRUCTURED_TEXT_ENABLE_OTSU_THRS
properties.description: Enables Otsu image thresholding for default, structured text images. Adaptive_thrs overrides Otsu when both are enabled. Improves text extraction by converting image to black and white. Works best for images with uniform lighting. For multicolor images with gradients, use adaptive threshold.

properties.name: STRUCTURED_TEXT_ENABLE_ADAPTIVE_THRS
properties.description: Enables adaptive image thresholding (overrides Otsu) for default, structured text images. Works better for images with lighting/color gradients.

properties.name: STRUCTURED_TEXT_ENABLE_ADAPTIVE_HIST_EQUALIZATION
properties.description: Enables CLAHE (Contrast Limited Adaptive Histogram Equalization) preprocessing for default, structured text images. Applies histogram equalization locally across an image, with contrast limits and bilinear interpolation to reduce noise. Overrides basic histogram equalization when enabled.

properties.name: STRUCTURED_TEXT_ENABLE_HIST_EQUALIZATION
properties.description: Enables histogram equalization as a preprocessing step for default, structured text images. Improves lighting and contrast for images with narrow pixel color ranges. Disabled when adaptive histogram equalization is enabled.

properties.name: STRUCTURED_TEXT_SHARPEN
properties.description: Weight of the sharpening parameter for default images. Higher values increase sharpening while values close to 0 will return the original image. Set to a negative value to disable sharpening.

properties.name: STRUCTURED_TEXT_SCALE
properties.description: Image rescaling factor for default images. 1.0 = original image size, any value greater than 1.0 increases input size. Default optimal rescaling set to 1.6. Set to a negative value to disable rescaling.

properties.name: UNSTRUCTURED_TEXT_ENABLE_PREPROCESSING
properties.description: Switch default image preprocessing behavior from STRUCTURED to UNSTRUCTRED image settings. Is overridden by image text type provided by feed-forward region TEXT_TYPE.

properties.name: UNSTRUCTURED_TEXT_ENABLE_OTSU_THRS
properties.description: Enables Otsu image thresholding for wild images with text. Adaptive_thrs overrides Otsu when both are enabled. Improves text extraction by converting image to black and white. Works best for images with uniform lighting. For multicolor images with gradients, use adaptive threshold.

properties.name: UNSTRUCTURED_TEXT_ENABLE_ADAPTIVE_THRS
properties.description: Enables adaptive image thresholding (overrides Otsu) for wild images with text. Works better for images with lighting/color gradients.

properties.name: UNSTRUCTURED_TEXT_ENABLE_ADAPTIVE_HIST_EQUALIZATION
properties.description: Enables CLAHE (Contrast Limited Adaptive Histogram Equalization) preprocessing for wild images with text. Applies histogram equalization locally across an image, with contrast limits and bilinear interpolation to reduce noise. Overrides basic histogram equalization when enabled.

properties.name: UNSTRUCTURED_TEXT_ENABLE_HIST_EQUALIZATION
properties.description: Enables histogram equalization as a preprocessing step for wild images with text. Improves lighting and contrast for images with narrow pixel color ranges. Disabled when adaptive histogram equalization is enabled.

properties.name: UNSTRUCTURED_TEXT_SHARPEN
properties.description: Weight of the sharpening parameter for wild images with text. Higher values increase sharpening while values close to 0 will return the original image. Set to a negative value to disable sharpening.

properties.name: UNSTRUCTURED_TEXT_SCALE
properties.description: Image rescaling factor for wild images with text. 1.0 = original image size, any value greater than 1.0 increases input size. Default optimal rescaling set to 2.6. Set to a negative value to disable rescaling.

properties.name: ROTATE_AND_DETECT
properties.description: When enabled, automatically perform OCR using detected orientation as well as a 180 degree rotation with an OCR confidence comparision to correctly parse upside down text.

properties.name: ROTATE_AND_DETECT_MIN_OCR_CONFIDENCE
properties.description: Specifies minimum text confidence required to skip second OCR pass with 180 degree rotation. Negative values will result in ROTATE_AND_DETECT performing two pass OCR regardless of text confidence from the initial pass.

properties.name: FULL_REGEX_SEARCH
properties.description: Toggles REGEX search to include all matching trigger words associated with the regex patterns for each tag. When disabled, only the first instance of the first matching trigger word for each tag category is included.
